sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from "react"; import './Navbar.css'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { Col, Card, CardImg, CardText, CardBody, CardTitle, CardSubtitle, Button, CardDeck, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem } from 'reactstrap'; import {BrowserRouter} from 'react-router-dom'; export class States extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { items: [], isLoading: false, name: "" } } componentDidMount() { this.setState({isLoading: true}); fetch('http://3.84.54.129:5000/api/states') .then(res => res.json()) .then((data) => { this.setState({ items: data.objects,isLoading: false}); }) .catch(console.log) } render() { var stateMap = { "Alabama":"AL", "Alaska":"AK", "Arizona":"AZ", "Arkansas":"AR", "California":"CA", "Colorado":"CO", "Connecticut":"CT", "Delaware":"DE", "Florida":"FL", "Georgia":"GA", "Hawaii":"HI", "Idaho":"ID", "Illinois":"IL", "Indiana":"IN", "Iowa":"IA", "Kansas":"KS", "Kentucky":"KY", "Louisiana":"LA", "Maine":"ME", "Maryland":"MD", "Massachusetts":"MA", "Michigan":"MI", "Minnesota":"MN", "Mississippi":"MS", "Missouri":"MO", "Montana":"MT", "Nebraska":"NE", "Nevada":"NV", "New Hampshire":"NH", "New Jersey":"NJ", "New Mexico":"NM", "New York":"NY", "North Carolina":"NC", "North Dakota":"ND", "Ohio":"OH", "Oklahoma":"OK", "Oregon":"OR", "Pennsylvania":"PA", "Rhode Island":"RI", "South Carolina":"SC", "South Dakota":"SD", "Tennessee":"TN", "Texas":"TX", "Utah":"UT", "Vermont":"VT", "Virginia":"VA", "Washington":"WA", "West Virginia":"WV", "Wisconsin":"WI", "Wyoming":"WY", }; const {items, isLoading} = this.state; console.log(isLoading) if (isLoading){ console.log(isLoading) return false; } console.log(items) return (
{items.slice(0, 3).map(item => {item.name} State: {item.state} Party: {item.party} Title: {item.title} )} {items.slice(3, 6).map(item => {item.first_name + " " + item.last_name} State: {item.state} Party: {item.party} Title: {item.title} )} {items.slice(6, 10).map(item => {item.first_name + " " + item.last_name} State: {item.state} Party: {item.party} Title: {item.title} )}
); } } export default States;
